languages.text: "Никогда. Мое сердце навсегда с Императором, но я — скверный инструмент для Него. Я буду служить правосудию, но не имею права его вершить. Поэтому я вручаю инструмент суда тебе".

"Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."
languages.original_text: "Никогда. Мое сердце навсегда с Императором, но я — скверный инструмент для Него. Я буду служить правосудию, но не имею права его вершить. Поэтому я вручаю инструмент суда тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to exact justice. And so I hand the tool of judgment to you."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to exact justice. And so I hand the tool of judgment to you."

languages.text: «Eso nunca. Mi corazón está por siempre con el Emperador, pero no soy más que un humilde instrumento de Su voluntad. Serviré a la causa de la justicia, pero no tengo ningún derecho a tomarla por mi mano. Por eso le confío a usted esta herramienta de enjuiciamiento».
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: «Eso nunca. Mi corazón está por siempre con el Emperador, pero no soy más que un humilde instrumento de Su voluntad. Serviré a la causa de la justicia, pero no tengo ningún derecho a tomarla por mi mano. Por eso le confío a usted esta herramienta de enjuiciamiento».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “并非如此。我的心永远与帝皇同在，但我不过是祂践行意志的卑微工具而已。我仍会为正义服务，但我没有权利实施正义。因此，我愿把审判的工具托付于你。”
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此。我的心永远与帝皇同在，但我不过是祂践行意志的卑微工具而已。我仍会为正义服务，但我没有权利实施正义。因此，我愿把审判的工具托付于你。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Jamais. Mon cœur appartient à l'Empereur, mais je ne suis qu'un piètre instrument de Sa volonté. Même si je continue à servir la cause de la justice, je n'ai aucun droit de l'appliquer. C'est pourquoi je vous confie cet outil de jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais. Mon cœur appartient à l'Empereur, mais je ne suis qu'un piètre instrument de Sa volonté. Même si je continue à servir la cause de la justice, je n'ai aucun droit de l'appliquer. C'est pourquoi je vous confie cet outil de jugement. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「決して。私の心は永遠に皇帝のもとにあるが、私は皇帝の意志を継ぐ哀れな道具だ。私は正義の大義に仕えてはいるが、正義を実現する権利はない。だから、この裁きの道具をあなたに委ねよう」
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: 「決して。私の心は永遠に皇帝のもとにあるが、私は皇帝の意志を継ぐ哀れな道具だ。私は正義の大義に仕えてはいるが、正義を実現する権利はない。だから、この裁きの道具をあなたに委ねよう」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Niemals. Mein Herz gehört für immer dem Imperator, doch ich bin ein schlechtes Instrument seines Willens. Ich werde der Sache der Gerechtigkeit dienen, doch ich habe nicht das Recht, sie selbst auszuüben. Und daher vertraue ich dieses Werkzeug des Urteils Euch an."
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: "Niemals. Mein Herz gehört für immer dem Imperator, doch ich bin ein schlechtes Instrument seines Willens. Ich werde der Sache der Gerechtigkeit dienen, doch ich habe nicht das Recht, sie selbst auszuüben. Und daher vertraue ich dieses Werkzeug des Urteils Euch an."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Asla. Kalbim sonsuza dek İmparator ile birliktedir. Ben yalnızca O'nun isteklerini yerine getiren bir aracım. Adalet davasını savunmaya devam edeceğim, uygulamaya ise yetkim yok. Bu yüzden bu adalet aracını sana emanet ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Never. My heart is forever with the Emperor, but I am a poor instrument of His will. I will serve the cause of justice, but I have no right to enact it. And so, I entrust this tool of judgement to you."

traits.locale_text: "Asla. Kalbim sonsuza dek İmparator ile birliktedir ama ben sadece O'nun isteklerini gerçekleştiren bir aletim. Adalet davasını savunmaya devam edeceğim ama onu uygulamaya yetkim yok. Bu yüzden bu adalet aracını sana emanet ediyorum."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion
